BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 140259Z JUL
   BY M/V POLAR EXPLORER TOWING 12 CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   23-55.90S 040-19.93W, 23-59.88S 041-50.87W,
   26-33.72S 042-39.65W, 27-06.50S 042-05.42W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 140359Z JUL.
